QuestData.Title: Harnessing Their Power
QuestData.Description: We have always believed that the primal creatures of Draenor could not be tamed. And yet, the Iron Horde found a way to weaponize the gronn. It would be to our advantage to learn how.$b$bVenture to the Iron Front, slay a Wargronn, and retrieve its harness. You may want to find help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Wargronn Harness from an Iron Wargronn at the Iron Front in Tanaan Jungle.
